name: Blobby Boi 3 (Alpha V1.0)
description:
the third installment of the blobby boi series, one which I intend on actually finishing this time.
Game making is fun, and I want to make a fun game for others to play! Hope you'll enjoy the process of me developing this game!

Controls (until I add a control screen):
WASD to move

Space to jump, double jump, and walljump
